hints.content:
Each whole has $6$ equal parts, so each part has a length of $\dfrac{1}{6}$.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, a tick mark labeled Point A, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point B, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point C, a tick mark at 1, and an ending tick mark labeled point D. Six equal rectangles labeled one-sixth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. !

hints.content:
We need to shade $\dfrac56$.  


[[☃ image 1]]



What point is located at $\dfrac56$?

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, four unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark with a dot labeled five-sixths, a tick mark at 1, and an unlabeled ending tick mark. An arrow points to the right from the tick mark at 0 to the tick mark labeled with a dot at five-sixths. Six equal rectangles are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. Five rectangles from the left are shaded and the sixth rectangle is not shaded. The set of shaded rectangles is labeled five-sixths. !

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{5}{6}$ on the number line?**



[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, a tick mark labeled Point A, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point B, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point C, a tick mark at 1, and an ending tick mark labeled point D. Six equal rectangles are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. !
